Plot: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.
Title: Riding in Cars with Boys
Actors: Drew Barrymore, Steve Zahn, Adam Garcia, Brittany Murphy
tomatoConsensus: Riding in Cars With Boys suffers from mixing grit and pathos with cuteness and comedy. Ironically, many critics found Zahn's character more compelling and three-dimensional than Barrymore's.
